original_title: 「好きです」工場勤務の地味めな女の子に告白されてOKしたら実はド淫乱で8発連続でヤられた話 川上奈々美
overview: I had to go out for a meal with a sober girl who manages inventory at my place of employment ... I had a relationship where I would meet once in a while, but suddenly I was confessed at a restaurant. Eh, really? Are you kidding? I see, are you coming? Things go on and have sex for the time being! I'm glad I did ... She has a sexual desire and doesn't let her lie down no matter how many times she does it. Continuous sex is a matter of course, one shot in the bath, and immediately after that, bed! At midnight when I was about to run out of physical strength, I found out that I had a lover, and the real ejaculation hell began.
title: 'I Like You' A Plain-looking Girl At The Plant Where I Work Confessed To Me, And Once I Said OK, She Was Actually A Slut And We Fucked For 8 Cumshots Nanami Kawakami
